thread.title: Airbnb beefs up liability insurance offering for hosts
thread.title_full: Airbnb beefs up liability insurance offering for hosts

title: Airbnb beefs up liability insurance offering for hosts
text:
Airbnb beefs up liability insurance offering for hosts 
Cnet Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Short-term rental service upgrades program to a primary insurance offering, making it available to all hosts in 16 countries, regardless of other coverage....
